column4: Im thinking of installing ubuntu on my computer..  I already have a free partition... If something goes wrong and fucks up, is there a chance my files get deleted?
I dont understand that..  Boots and swap and stuff
Im setting up a dual boot.. thats just done auto for you, if you select it right?
If something DOES go wrong, I will still have windows and all the rest of my programs & Files?
When you install, it will load GRUB for you, yes.
If you don't over-write your Windows Partition.
